resources.string: Dental Perfectionman has a passion for helping people. Bad dental hygiene can lead to many other issues. His goal is to educate and fight against bad dental hygiene. He fights against Dr. Racuza and his minions to help people take care of themselves and their teeth.
tiene una pasión por ayudar a la gente. Mala higiene dental puede conducir a muchas otras cuestiones. Su objetivo es educar y luchar contra la mala higiene dental.

Perla Blanca is the wife of Dental Perfectionman. Together, they fight against bad dental hygiene. She fights with Dental Perfectionman, against Dr. Racuza and his minions, to help people take care of themselves and their teeth.

Perla Blanca es la esposa de Dental Perfectionman. Juntos, luchan contra la mala higiene dental. Ella pelea con Dental Perfectionman, contra Dr. Racuza y sus secuaces, ayudar a la gente a cuidar de sí mismos y sus dientes.

He and Dental Perfectionman were childhood friends. He teams up with Dental Perfectionman and Perla Blanca to help fight against bad dental hygiene. He fights with Dental Perfectionman and Perla Blanca, against Dr. Racuza and his minions, to help people take care of themselves and their teeth.

El y Dental Perfectionman eran amigos de la infancia Él se asocia con Dental Perfectionman y Perla Blanca para ayudar a luchar contra la mala higiene dental. Él lucha con Perfectionman Dental y Perla Blanca, contra el Dr. Racuza y sus secuaces, ayudar a la gente a cuidar de sí mismos y sus dientes.
Anti is the pet of Dental Perfectionman and Perla Blanca. He fights bad dental hygiene with his owners. He dispenses toothpaste to do his part to fight dental decay.
Anti es la mascota de Dental Perfectionman y Perla Blanca. Lucha mala higiene dental con sus dueños. Dispensa el dentífrico para hacer su parte para combatir la caries dental.
Plaque Attack has a plaque problem. He also has anger problems because of having been bullied. His anger gets him in a lot of trouble.
Plaque Attack tiene un problema de placa. También tiene problemas de ira por haber sido intimidado. Su ira lo mete en un montón de problemas.
Plaque builds up as a result of not brushing your teeth.
Placa se acumula como consecuencia de no cepillarse los dientes
Sweet Tooth Sam has a horrible diet. He eats whatever he can get his hands on! He never brushes his teeth.
tiene una dieta horrible. Come lo que puede conseguir! Nunca cepilla los dientes
Acid is created when plaque and complex carbs and sugars mix from all the bad foods that he eats.
El ácido se crea cuando placa y carbohidratos complejos y azúcares de la mezcla de todos los malos alimentos que come.
aCIDic is a social media and video game junky and is also a hacker. He has a very abrasive or caustic personality. He does not know how to make friends or share.
aCIDic es un medio de comunicación social y video juego adicto y también es un hacker. Tiene una personalidad muy abrasiva o cáustica.
Acid attacks teeth to break them down and cause cavities.
El ácido ataca los dientes para romperlos y causar caries.
Cathy Cavity has a mouth full of cavities. She is a kleptomaniac and steals whatever she can get her hands on.
Cathy Cavity tiene la boca llena de caries. Ella es un cleptómano y roba lo que ella puede tener en sus manos
Cavities are holes in your teeth.
Las caries son agujeros en los dientes
She is a ginger who uses her looks to get what she wants. She is a perfect ten until she opens her mouth. Beauty is only skin deep. She is perfect on the outside, but not on the inside.
Ella es pelirroja que usa su belleza para conseguir lo que quiere. Ella es una perfecta hasta que abra la boca. Belleza es sólo superficial. Es perfecta en el exterior, pero no en el interior.
She has gingivitis, which is bleeding of the gums.
Ella tiene la gingivitis, que es sangrado de las encías
He is a homeless vet who has a drug and alcohol problem. He will steal and hurt people in order to keep getting his fix.
Es un veterano que tiene un problema de drogas y alcohol. Será robar y herir a la gente con el fin de seguir recibiendo su dosis.
Foul Mouth Frank has halitosis. Extremely bad breath!
Foul Mouth Frank tiene mal aliento. Extremadamente mal aliento!

He dropped out of school and doesn’t know how to spell correctly. He misspells his name with two o’s instead of a u. He is so big and strong because he shoots steroids. The steroids cause him to have ‘roid rage, impotence and balding.

Él dejó la escuela y no sabe cómo se escribe correctamente. Él comete esos errores su nombre con una o dos en lugar de una u. Es tan grande y fuerte porque le dispara a los esteroides. Los esteroides causan que tenga roid rabia, impotencia y calvicie
Roothless Toothless has the final stage of dental decline, which is tooth loss. Once we lose our teeth, we cannot fix the damage.
Roothless Toothless tiene la etapa final del deterioro dental, que es la pérdida del diente. Una vez que perdemos nuestros dientes, no podemos arreglar el daño.

Dr. Racuza is a mad scientist who the seven villains team up with. He invents a substance that is highly addictive and rots out the teeth very fast. He infuses that substance into candy, sodas, drugs and alcohol, which are already bad for us and our teeth. The villains give those things to people, without them knowing. They grow an army of people who are subservient to them, to do their bidding in order to keep getting their fix.

El Dr. Racuza es un científico loco que los siete villanos equipo con. Inventa una sustancia que es altamente adictiva y pudre los dientes muy rápido. Infunde esa sustancia en dulces, refrescos, drogas y alcohol, que ya son malos para nosotros y para nuestros dientes. Los villanos dan esas cosas a la gente, sin ellos saberlo. Crecen un ejército de personas que son subordinadas a ellos, para hacer su hacer una oferta para seguir recibiendo su dosis
